aboutMeSection.aboutMe_text_intro: I'm Kavu Maithri, a passionate AI & Machine Learning Engineer with experience building and deploying practical AI solutions across NLP, generative AI, and computer vision. I enjoy turning complex problems into reliable, real world systems and working in collaborative, international teams.
aboutMeSection.aboutMe_text_connect: I work primarily in English and have German proficiency at B1 level. Outside of work, I'm a pet lover, enjoy bike trips, and like reading in my free time. Let's collaborate and build something amazing together!

skillsSection.skills_text_shortDesc: I not only work with these technologies but excel in using them with best practices to deliver high-quality results. My expertise spans the entire machine learning lifecycle, from data processing to model deployment and maintenance.

contactMeSection.contactMe_text_connect_shortDesc1: Feel free to reach out if you'd like to collaborate.
contactMeSection.contactMe_text_connect_shortDesc2: You are just a few clicks away!

experienceSection.experience_text_shortDesc: With X years of experience building and deploying robust, scalable AI solutions.

cvSection.cv_description: Get a detailed overview of my professional experience, education, skills, and achievements in a comprehensive PDF format.

blogsSection.blogs_description: Sharing insights, tutorials, and thoughts on technology, development, and industry trends through my writing.

projectsSection.projects_shortDesc: I have worked on a variety of machine learning projects, ranging from data analysis and model training to full-stack applications with AI components. Each project demonstrates my commitment to clean code, performance optimization, and technical excellence.
